SmartFieldSpec.Name: Relation Only Constituent - Inactive Smart Field
SmartFieldSpec.Description: Inactive Constituents who have the constituency Relation Only
SmartFieldSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SmartFieldSpec.DisplayName: Relation Only Constituent - Inactive Smart Field
SmartFieldSpec.CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SMARTFIELD_RELATIONONLYCONSTITUENT_INACTIVE ( @ASOF datetime ) as -- write sql to calculate the smart field values based on the parameters and ASOF date select ID, 1 from dbo.CONSTITUENT where ISINACTIVE = 1 and exists (select DESCRIPTION from UFN_CONSTITUENT_GETALLCONSTITUENCIES (constituent.ID) where CONSTITUENCYCODEID = '8B6ECCFD-6829-4FBC-B092-58CA083F9322')
